     微信支付营销代金券接口

      • createFavorStocksV3

        FavorStocksCreateResult createFavorStocksV3(FavorStocksCreateRequest request)
                                     throws WxPayException
         代金券接口-创建代金券批次API
 文档详见: https://pay.weixin.qq.com/wiki/doc/apiv3/wxpay/marketing/convention/chapter3_1.shtml
 接口链接：https://api.mch.weixin.qq.com/v3/marketing/favor/coupon-stocks
        参数:
        request - 请求对象
        返回:
        FavorStocksResult 微信返回的批次号信息。
        抛出:
        WxPayException - the wx pay exception

      • createFavorCouponsV3

        FavorCouponsCreateResult createFavorCouponsV3(String openid,
                                              FavorCouponsCreateRequest request)
                                       throws WxPayException

 接口链接：https://api.mch.weixin.qq.com/v3/marketing/favor/users/{openid}/coupons
        参数:
        openid - 用户openid
        request - 请求对象
        返回:
        FavorStocksResult 微信返回的发放结果信息。
        抛出:
        WxPayException - the wx pay exception

        offset - 分页大小

        返回:
